= Getting Started =

== Checkout Source ==

   * Checkout source for this project.

== Build Tools ==

   * Import into Eclipse IDE as an existing Java project.

- or -

   * Run Book Publisher and related tools using Eclipse launchers.

== Usage ==

   * Build tools
   * Start Open Office in "headless" mode
   * Run required tool. Some tools require OO in headless mode, some do not.

See [Usage]
